channel.title: BMTC: Another Day, Another Troll (FailCrash Pt. 1)
channel.description:
[img]https://img291.imageshack.us/img291/1113/troll1.jpg[/img] [img]https://img269.imageshack.us/img269/267/troll2g.jpg[/img] [img]https://img372.imageshack.us/img372/3528/troll3.jpg[/img] [img]https://img83.imageshack.us/img83/4112/troll4h.jpg[/img] [img]https://img372.imageshack.us/img372/1117/troll5.jpg[/img] [img]https://img291.imageshack.us/img291/9523/troll6.jpg[/img] [img]https://img291.imageshack.us/img291/6799/troll7.jpg[/img]
Notes: *Everything FailCrash says in this comic is very close to what he actually said, in the context he actually said it. Just so everyone can be reminded of what a moron the guy really was. *TF2 models are extremely hard to pose (see panel 3 of page 7) *Thanks to operative lm for finding me the Dead Ringer model! *Also thanks to whoever set the precedent for the "banhammer" construct... I love that thing! *The next chapter will be done whenever. For now I'm getting back to Overture for a few days.

item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
awww, you mean I’m not “in” with the cool crowd? Damn! If I post more in-jokes, 4chan memes, and quote the cool kids while saying “this” can I be in?

item.source: BMTC: Another Day, Another Troll (FailCrash Pt. 1)

item.title: BMTC: Another Day, Another Troll (FailCrash Pt. 1)
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Can’t believe I hadn’t seen this 'till now. Fucking brilliance, and pretty much exactly what I had in mind for a very similar comic (though to be picky I think it was Ram that gave him the infraction that pushed him over the edge into his first ban, so I would have had him in the first part). Now where’s part two? Wants Moar!

mattemuse:

Not funny, also you’re trying too hard. Did I mention its not funny? I’m starting to think Garry’s Mod is slowly destroying the internet.

If you’d been around during all this actually happening instead of being banned for being a git, you’d see the funny side. Or possibly not, but then no-one gives a shit, given how sorely you weren’t missed while you were gone.

Read full topic

Good work chap, hope you’ll make an other one!

item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Such a tiny amount of me. Shit sucks.

Well, I laughed, good one. Next one should be raw_bean making a spy_check with a flame_thrower.
Sorry for the late response, don’t visit show-off that much lately.

item.title: BMTC: Another Day, Another Troll (FailCrash Pt. 1)
item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur
item.description:
HatOrTat4Cat:

A troll is defined by provoking comments, in which to gain a reaction to upset people on purpose, I am hardly a troll sir, as I have done nothing of the sort to be considered a troll, I was merely striking the possible identity of the so-called FailCrash, it is a mystery that I tried humorously to solve, in doing so, I possible failed at it, but at the cost of personal entertain.

If I were a troll, I come up with a reaction such as this “STFU! I r not tr0ll leik!”

but I wouldn’t say a thing like that, nope, wouldn’t say it at all

Anyway ontopic, amusing comic I must say, ha ha RATHER!

That whole thing read in a polite posh english voice in my head.

Even the example troll…:fffuuu:

Read full topic
item.source: BMTC: Another Day, Another Troll (FailCrash Pt. 1)
